definition[0]: when you give something to someone or do something for them because you have done something wrong to them in the past
example[0]: Offenders must make reparation for their crimes through community service.
definition[1]: payment made to someone for loss, damage etc that someone has caused them in the past
example[1]: A commission will gather demands for reparations from companies and individuals.
example[2]: The company has few resources to finance reparation payments.
